news.title: Jamie Dimon says a recession is 'likely outcome' from Trump's tariff turmoil
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: Bonds crater, 10-year yield spikes briefly above 4.5% in confounding move that's worrying Wall Street
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs regime continues to rattle markets. Treasury yields surged Wednesday as U.S.-China trade tensions continued to escalate.

news.title: Walmart scraps quarterly operating income forecast, citing Trump's tariffs
news.summary: Walmart said it wants to maintain the ability to keep prices low, which could affect its profits. Walmart: "We want to keep our prices as low as possible"

news.title: Delta CEO says Trump tariffs are hurting bookings as airline pulls 2025 forecast
news.summary: Delta said it couldn't reaffirm its 2025 financial guidance. Delta said it can't confirm financial guidance for 2015, 2016, 2017 or 2018. The airline said it will provide more details on its financial guidance in the future.

news.title: Google will let companies run its Gemini AI models in their own data centers
news.summary: Google is opening up access to its AI models beyond its data centers. Until now, developers of AI models have generally refrained from opening up to the public.
